channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: I Think You Should Leave, Jamaal Bowman
item.description: The sense of entitlement and petulance on display is staggering.

item.title: Are ‘blue zones’ a myth? Extreme aging is built on pension fraud and century-old lies, researcher claims
item.description: New research suggests the world’s oldest humans, living in so-called "blue zones", often only exist on paper.

item.title: Skechers draw backlash for full-page ad in Vogue that reeks of AI. ‘You actually didn’t save any money because now I hate you’
item.description: The footwear retail company recently came under fire for allegations of using AI. Other corporations are also getting in trouble for said usage.

item.title: The Musk Factor
item.description: Musk brings a boundless optimism and can-do verve, and he’s a healthy new ingredient to Trump’s populist mix.

item.title: The Endowment Syndrome: Why Elite Funds Are Falling Behind
item.description: Endowments have long been considered elite investors, but outdated strategies and skyrocketing costs are eroding their edge

item.title: What’s Driving the Pete Hegseth Confirmation Fight
item.description: Hegseth’s critics have been increasingly marginalized by getting to his left.

item.title: By Bowing To The Leftist Mob, Caitlin Clark Abandons Her Most Ardent Defenders
item.description: What Clark fails to realize is that the leftists she's trying to appease will never embrace her.

item.title: ‘A Public-Shaming Penalty’: Appeals Court Strikes Down NASDAQ Corporate Board Diversity Rules
item.description: A major court victory for keeping power constrained by law and woke capital focused on capital, not wokeness.

item.title: In a first, Time's 'Person of the Year' Trump gets fact-check from the magazine
item.description: Time magazine gave Donald Trump something it has never done for a Person of the Year designee: a lengthy fact-check of claims he made in an accompanyi...

item.title: Trump hosts Apple CEO at Mar-a-Lago as big tech leaders continue outreach to president-elect
item.description: Donald Trump hosted Apple CEO Tim Cook for a Friday evening dinner at the president-elect's Mar-a-Lago resort, according to a person familiar with the...

item.title: Agency Risk in the Lower Middle Market: A Guide for PE Professionals
item.description: If there was a Wild West in Private Equity (PE), it would be the Lower Middle Market (LMM) — the ecosystem of companies with revenues between $5 milli...

item.title: When Tariffs Hit: Stocks, Bonds, and Volatility
item.description: Tariff threats are sending analysts' heads spinning. What will be the consequences for stocks, bonds, and volatility?

item.title: Inside the secret history of Design for Good, an alliance between companies with $4 trillion in market cap to devise solutions to the world’s biggest problems
item.description: Design for Good co-founder Ben Sheppard explains why big names like Microsoft, Nestle and DBS got involved.

item.title: A suspected Chinese spy with business ties to Prince Andrew is barred from U.K.
item.description: A suspected Chinese spy with business ties to Prince Andrew has been barred from the U.K. because of concerns he poses a threat to national security.

item.title: Climbing the Ladder in Finance: The PIE Framework for Investment Professionals
item.description: Promotions require more than just hard work and results. By mastering the PIE framework, you’ll position yourself for long-term career success.

item.title: How Team Trump Turned The RNC Into A Get-Out-The-Vote Machine
item.description: The party needed significant reform after having to pick up the pieces from the dismal tenure of Ronna Romney McDaniel.

item.title: US swaps prisoners with China, releasing 3 convicted spies
item.description: Two Chinese spies and a Chinese national charged for disseminating child pornography were part of a recent White House prison swap as Biden's presiden...

item.title: GOP Sen. Markwayne Mullin Decries Social Media For Giving Americans Insight Into Congress’s Backdoor Dealmaking
item.description: The Sooner State Republican decried how social media has hampered lawmakers' ability to negotiate on legislation behind closed doors.

item.title: Corrupt Media Obsess Over Luigi Mangione After Memory Holing Trump’s Would-Be Assassins
item.description: The media builds a mystique around an alleged murderer while ignoring two gunmen who targeted a presidential candidate.

item.title: Trump posts 'how it's going' message contrasting Time Person of the Year cover with mugshot
item.description: President-elect Trump posted a tongue-in-cheek "how it started, how it's going" post on his Truth Social network Friday after he was named Time's Pers...

item.title: Polio is a deadly disease with a vaccine that RFK Jr.’s adviser wants to ban. Here’s how the immunization works
item.description: The polio vaccine has all but obliterated the illness that once killed thousands and paralyzed 15,000 people nationwide every year.

item.title: Oregon city asks people to please stop putting googly eyes on public art as prank becomes tourist attraction
item.description: The city has so far spent $1,500 on removing googly eyes from seven of the eight sculptures impacted.

item.title: A Guide for Investment Analysts: Toward a Longer View of US Financial Markets
item.description: Understanding the historical context of financial markets is crucial for investment professionals seeking to make informed decisions in today’s comple...

item.title: Texas AG Ken Paxton sues New York doctor for providing abortion pills across state lines
item.description: Texas Attorney General Ken Paxton is suing a New York doctor for prescribing abortion pills to a Dallas-area woman who wound up in the emergency room ...

item.title: Trump says GOP will try to eliminate daylight saving time
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump said Friday that Republicans will attempt to eliminate daylight saving time, the twice-yearly practice of moving clocks t...

item.title: Fox News Politics: ‘Kids for Cash' Clemency Sparks Keystone Clamor
item.description: The Fox News Politics newsletter, with the latest updates on the Trump transition, exclusive interviews and more Fox News politics content.

item.title: Senior Trump official reveals visit that set ‘trajectory’ for election victory
item.description: President-elect Trump was hosted at East Palestine by Sen. JD Vance shortly after the derailment disaster, which Steven Cheung agreed was when his tra...

item.title: Dems Call Trump A Threat To Democracy Because He Can Turn Their Lawfare Back On Them
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump is apparently a threat to democracy because he has the power to use the DOJ the way Democrats did against him.

item.title: Tulsi Gabbard Is Right for Director of National Intelligence
item.description: She has the experience, temperament, and professional integrity necessary for the American intelligence community to win and keep the trust of the Ame...
